#summary Features planned for the next release

=Partial to-do list for version 0.7.0=

The 0.7 version will add new features. Some of these features may already be available in the pre-releases available at the download site.

  * Rudimentary Mopidy support (incl. Spotify integration), WIP.
  * Make the text in the status bar selectable and improve the current song display.
  * Filter per genre on a per-song instead of a per-album basis in the genre views.
